rows.text: Personal electronic identity card (BelPic or eID) Cryptoflex Javacard 32K
Roll-out started October 2004. Roll-out must be completed by end of 2009.
Електронна безконтактна чип карта (Public Transport Card)
Център за градска мобилност (Urban Mobility Centre)
September 2008. Passes for all modes of transport. Saver tickets for tram and trolley only.
Roll-out started October 2004. Roll-out must be completed by end of 2009.
Introduced in September 2012, expected to replace paper tickets by January 2013 and ID-card based tickets by April 2013.
Tram et Bus de la CUB
Introduced on 12 May 2001. Fully implemented on all routes in April 2006. 3 of 689 routes now working without turnstiles.
Lipetsk Transport System united transport card
Roll-out started October 2008. Roll-out planned to be completed by end of 2010.
2007, issued by BELBİM, smart card used in almost all public transport
Available as a standalone card, store loyalty card, or as an optional application on a smartcard id from partner organisations. June 2008.
Brighton & Hove Bus and Coach Company Ltd
University of the West of England
Replaced the "wave & save" card on 1 April 2010
Lancashire & Cumbria District Concessionary Travel Authorities
Announced June 2012, expected to launch summer 2013.
Live Smart 3 day city tourist ticket
Passport Plus (local and long distance season ticket)
Tyne and Wear Passenger Transport Executive
Pilot November 2006, roll-out to all bus services 2008 – 2009
SmartFare electronic purse stored on Thamesdown smart card
TravelPass season ticket stored on Thamesdown smart card
Spring 2013 with Young Persons MCard, leading into other concessions available and to further lead into PAYG MCard in Late 2014, all with online purchasing.
